channel.title: K 5 on Learn Robotics Academy
channel.description: Recent content in K 5 on Learn Robotics Academy

item.title: Robotics for Elementary Education
item.description: Elementary Activities with Edison Course details Learn how to program the Meet Edison robot for K-5 elementary education. Hosted by Learn Robotics Instructor: Liz Miller All content can be used for educational purposes. Not for resale or commercial distribution without the prior authorization of Learn Robotics. Overview Robotics combines programming, electronics, and mechanics into a device that helps us perform tasks in the real-world. We will use the affordable Meet Edison Robot to complete interactive robotics labs.
